poem:
Title: "The Erroneous Despatch"

Guidance lost in red tape,
a grim missive's torment wakes.
Rwanda echoes in each phrase,
a spectre through morning haze.
In error, despair partakes,
an ink blotted, heart's mistake.
Oh, paper birds of state,
your flight's path does grate.
Labour's voice in the fray,
a thorn in disarray,
Yet hope does reside,
in legal minds that chide.
